column4: Hi, I am new to Ubuntu, Installed Ubuntu 8.04 some time back, when Iam trying to view movies from websites the system hangs up, I  have to restart my machine using the restart button,Can anyone help me with this
hmm. you'll have to give us a better description of the problem.  run your web browser from a terminal and recreate the crash conditions, then post the errors you get in the terminal to pastebin
